title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Wake up to convenience and great taste with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black. Designed to fit your life—and your counter—its slim 8-inch-wide profile saves space without sacrificing performance. Brew 6, 8, or 10 oz cups in under a minute with simple one-touch button controls, perfect for busy mornings, midday pick-me-ups, or effortless entertaining.

Enjoy fewer refills with the 36 oz removable water reservoir, and count on Smart Start to heat and brew in one seamless process—no waiting, no fuss. The energy-efficient auto-off feature powers down your brewer 2 hours after the last brew to help save energy. Need a quick cup of hot water for tea, oatmeal, or soups? Just dispense hot water on demand.

The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and even holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup. Compatible with hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties, plus the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter for your favorite ground coffee, the K-Compact gives you unlimited options in a compact footprint. Fast, reliable, and stylish—your perfect cup is always within reach with the Keurig K-Compact. Packaging may vary.
